snippet.title: The Last Hero: Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
This is the gameplay video of the demo of The Last Hero. The demo is available for free on Steam, click the link below or search for "The Last Hero" on Steam and play it now! Thank you!
Play the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1521230/The_Last_Hero/
